languages.text: "Бедная маленькая кузина! Так старалась спасти своих бесхребетных собратьев, а в итоге подвела и их, и себя, и даже сво{mf|его|ю} занятную спутни{mf|ка|цу}-элантах".
"My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."
languages.original_text: "Бедная маленькая кузина! Так старалась спасти своих бесхребетных собратьев, а в итоге подвела и их, и себя, и даже сво{mf|его|ю} занятную спутни{mf|ка|цу}-элантах".

traits.locale_text: "My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you accomplished in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."
"My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you accomplished in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."
"My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."
"My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."
"My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."

languages.text: “我可怜的表妹！你不顾一切，打算拯救你那些软骨头族人，可到头来，你却辜负了他们，辜负了你自己，甚至辜负了你那位古怪的伙伴——你的那位外界人。”
languages.original_text: "My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."

traits.locale_text: “我可怜的表妹！你不顾一切，打算拯救你那些软骨头族人，可到头来，你却辜负了他们，辜负了你自己，甚至辜负了你那位古怪的伙伴——你的那位外界人。”

languages.text: 「可哀想ないとこよ！そんなにしてまで弱気な同胞を救いたかったというのに、結局は彼らの期待を裏切り、自身を裏切り、そして好奇心の強い仲間、エランタですら失望させただけだった」
languages.original_text: "My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."

traits.locale_text: 「可哀想ないとこよ！そんなにしてまで弱気な同胞を救いたかったというのに、結局は彼らの期待を裏切り、自身を裏切り、そして好奇心の強い仲間、エランタですら失望させただけだった」

languages.text: « Ma pauvre petite cousine ! Tu désirais ardemment sauver tes congénères si veules, mais tu n'as réussi qu'à les trahir, à te trahir toi-même, ainsi que ton étrange {mf|compagnon|compagne}, ton elantach. »
languages.original_text: "My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."

traits.locale_text: « Ma pauvre petite cousine ! Tu désirais ardemment sauver tes congénères si veules, mais tu n'as réussi qu'à les trahir, à te trahir toi-même, ainsi que ton étrange {mf|compagnon|compagne}, ton elantach. »

languages.text: «¡Mi pequeña prima! Te empeñaste tanto en salvar a tu cobarde gente que al final solo conseguiste fallarles, además de fallarte a ti y a tu extrañ{mf|o|a} compañer{mf|o|a}, tu elantach».
languages.original_text: "My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi pequeña prima! Te empeñaste tanto en salvar a tu cobarde gente que al final solo conseguiste fallarles, además de fallarte a ti y a tu extrañ{mf|o|a} compañer{mf|o|a}, tu elantach».

languages.text: "Meine arme kleine Vetterin. Ihr wolltet so verzweifelt Eure rückgtratlose Art retten, dass Ihr am Ende sie, Euch und selbst Euren seltsamen Gefährten, Euren Elantach, enttäuscht habt."
languages.original_text: "My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Meine arme kleine Vetterin. Ihr wolltet so verzweifelt Eure rückgtratlose Art retten, dass Ihr am Ende sie, Euch und selbst Euren seltsamen Gefährten, Euren Elantach, enttäuscht habt."

languages.text: "Zavallı minik soydaşım! Omurgasız soyunu kurtarmak için çok çabaladın ama en nihayetinde tek başardığın; onları, kendini ve hatta tuhaf yoldaşın elantach'ı yüzüstü bırakmak oldu."
languages.original_text: "My poor little cousin! You were so desperate to save your spineless kin, yet all you did in the end was fail them, fail yourself, and even your curious companion, your elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Zavallı minik kuzenim! Omurgasız soyunu kurtarmak için çok çabaladın ama en nihayetinde tek başardığın şey onları, kendini ve hatta tuhaf yoldaşın elantach'ı yüzüstü bırakmaktı."
